Jewels: 7 Running Condition: NOT RUNNING Sets: Stem Monogrammed: NoWeight: 79.3 grams Size: 12s Measurements: 2 5/8" total height from the base to the top of the extended bail, 1 31/32" (50.2mm) in diameter and 9/16" (14.1mm) thick This vintage Standard watch has black Arabic numbers printed on a white face with Standard USA written above the center of the dial and beautiful blue hands. Please note, there is some cracking to the dial, as can be seen in the enlarged photographs. There is a sunk seconds register at the base with black Arabic numbers. The crystal has minimal surface wear and is in good condition. The back interior of the case is stamped Wadsworth Rambler Warranted 10 Years,3484176. The movement is stamped BD315460, New York Standard Watch Co. USA, 7 Jewels. The gold filled case has some surface wear and the back is decorated with a gorgeous floral engraving. This piece is NOT-Running but would be a great watch for parts or repair. We are not watch experts and this has not been serviced. We do not guarantee these watches, but do our best to photograph them and describe them properly. We are happy to be of assistance any way that we may. This watch is gold filled. This piece has not been professionally cleaned in order to maintain its original vintage integrity. Please check out the enlarged pictures. Thank you for looking and enjoy bidding! Feel free to ask any polite questions and thank you for checking out my auctions. If there is a specific ring, pin or medal that you are in the market for let us know.
